item.title: Photographer Discovers Train Part That Could Hold Key to Spain Train Crash
item.description: Officials said they had located a previously unreported train undercarriage down a gully near the site of a train crash in Spain that killed 42 people...

item.title: Islamic State Claims Deadly Attack on Chinese Restaurant in Afghanistan

item.title: Trump, Venezuela and Oil
item.description: The president’s message since sending troops into Venezuela has been clear: This is about oil, not democracy.

item.title: Israel Seizes UNRWA’s Jerusalem Headquarters

item.title: For Syria’s Government, Kurdish Deal Is a Big Win on Shaky Ground
item.description: The government’s move to assert control over areas under Kurdish rule is a major test for President Ahmed al-Sharaa as fresh clashes erupted.
